welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bad Munstereifel, a charming town nestled in the picturesque Eifel region of Germany. Known for its historic buildings, excellent hiking trails, and quaint cafes, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free for first 30 minutes, then requires payment for longer use.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aachen/Merzbruck Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Aachen/Merzbruck Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
